title: Guerrilla: The Taking of Patty Hearst
actors: Russ Little, Michael Bortin, Timothy Findley, Dan Grove
plot: February 4, 1974, Patty Hearst, granddaughter of William Randolph Heart, was kidnapped by the Symbionese Liberation Army (SLA), who first demanded a prisoner swap for Hearst, then, as it failed, demanded $6 million worth of food for the poor of the Bay Area.
name: Guerrilla: The Taking of Patty Hearst
